VAPOR_DENSITY.description: Density and opacity of rising vapor in the neck/helm
VAPOR_DENSITY.distillation_context: Indicates current heating rate and energy input level; thin vapor = gentle, dense = vigorous

architecture_mapping.relationship: k (ENERGY_MODULATOR) presence tracks energy input intensity
QO lane is k-rich, encoding energy-application phases

CONDENSATE_DRIP_RATE.description: Rate of condensate drops from condenser into receiver
CONDENSATE_DRIP_RATE.distillation_context: Primary indicator of distillation progress; too fast = inadequate separation, too slow = energy waste

architecture_mapping.relationship: FLOW operators track product movement and output rate
FL enriched at line end (position 0.576) = output check at control block close

FOAM_ONSET.description: Appearance of foam/froth at liquid surface indicating boil transition
FOAM_ONSET.distillation_context: Critical danger signal: foam precedes boil-over, the most common failure mode

architecture_mapping.relationship: PHASE_ORDERING (41%) = material in wrong phase/location, foam is precursor
h (PHASE_MANAGER) handles phase boundary transitions

LIQUID_COLOR.description: Color of liquid in flask and receiver indicating composition
LIQUID_COLOR.distillation_context: Fraction identity indicator; different fractions have characteristic colors

architecture_mapping.relationship: PP MIDDLEs encode material property distinctions in 100D space
Each folio/program has unique MIDDLE vocabulary = distinct material profiles

PHASE_BOUNDARY_VISIBILITY.description: Visible interface between liquid and vapor phases in the vessel
PHASE_BOUNDARY_VISIBILITY.distillation_context: Tracking this boundary is core to managing distillation; it moves with temperature

architecture_mapping.relationship: h (PHASE_MANAGER) manages the liquid-vapor boundary
QO/CHSH lane transition marks shift between energy modes

SURFACE_AGITATION.description: Turbulence and roiling at the liquid surface
SURFACE_AGITATION.distillation_context: Intensity of agitation tracks energy input; excessive = approaching overshoot

architecture_mapping.relationship: ENERGY_OVERSHOOT (6%) = thermal damage from excessive energy
Kernel boundary k->e is the energy-to-stability transition

CONDENSER_CLARITY.description: Clarity vs cloudiness of condensate output
CONDENSER_CLARITY.distillation_context: Cloudy condensate indicates contamination or mixed fractions

architecture_mapping.relationship: COMPOSITION_JUMP (24%) = impure fraction passing through

FLOW_DIRECTION.description: Direction of liquid flow through apparatus (reflux return vs distillate forward)
FLOW_DIRECTION.distillation_context: In pelican reflux, liquid circulates; wrong flow direction means apparatus failure

architecture_mapping.relationship: FLOW_OPERATOR classes (7, 30) track directional flow
Two distinct FL states: hazardous (S0) vs safe (S5) flow

BUBBLE_CADENCE.description: Rhythm and frequency of boiling bubbles
BUBBLE_CADENCE.distillation_context: Steady cadence = stable boil; irregular = approaching transition; rapid = energy excess

architecture_mapping.relationship: QO/CHSH alternation (55.4%) creates rhythmic energy/stability oscillation
Cadence is first-order (current state predicts next), no accumulation needed

PITCH_CHANGE.description: Change in boiling sound pitch as conditions shift
PITCH_CHANGE.distillation_context: Pitch change signals phase transition or temperature shift at boil point

architecture_mapping.relationship: 6-state automaton transitions mark qualitative system state changes
System converges to STATE-C (steady state) with increasing completion

CONDENSER_HISS.description: Hissing sound of hot vapor contacting cool condenser surface
CONDENSER_HISS.distillation_context: Normal hiss = condensation working; absence = condenser too hot or no vapor

architecture_mapping.relationship: e (STABILITY_ANCHOR) represents cooling/equilibration engagement
CHSH lane is e-rich, encoding stabilization/monitoring phases

PRESSURE_THUD.description: Sudden thump or bang from overpressure event in sealed vessel
PRESSURE_THUD.distillation_context: Immediate danger signal in pelican (sealed vessel); requires emergency response

architecture_mapping.relationship: CONTAINMENT_TIMING (24%) = pressure/overflow in sealed vessel
Hazard gate fires in 1 token = immediate categorical response

FRAGRANCE_SHIFT.description: Change in distillate odor indicating different fraction emerging
FRAGRANCE_SHIFT.distillation_context: Primary fraction identification method; each aromatic fraction has characteristic smell

architecture_mapping.relationship: 972 MIDDLEs in 100D space encode material property distinctions
Each program uses distinct MIDDLE vocabulary = distinct material profiles
5 affordance families map to distinct material behavior classes

OFF_ODOR.description: Unexpected or foul smell indicating contamination
OFF_ODOR.distillation_context: Detection of contamination or wrong fraction; requires trained nose

architecture_mapping.relationship: COMPOSITION_JUMP (24%) = impure fraction, detectable by smell
HT correlates with discrimination difficulty (r=0.504); olfactory contexts require expert attention

BURNING_SCENT.description: Acrid smell of material burning/scorching on vessel wall
BURNING_SCENT.distillation_context: Catastrophic failure indicator; material is being destroyed

architecture_mapping.relationship: ENERGY_OVERSHOOT (6%) = thermal damage/scorching

FRACTION_IDENTITY.description: Recognition of which specific product/fraction is currently distilling
FRACTION_IDENTITY.distillation_context: Expert knowledge: each fraction has a signature smell that identifies the cut point

architecture_mapping.relationship: PP MIDDLEs encode material property parameters, not substance names
100D incompatibility encodes what materials cannot co-occur in a process step

VESSEL_HEAT.description: Temperature of apparatus walls felt by hand
VESSEL_HEAT.distillation_context: Direct thermal state assessment; hand on vessel gives crude but categorical temperature

architecture_mapping.relationship: k (ENERGY_MODULATOR) tracks energy input state
QO lane is k-rich, encoding energy-application phases
THERMAL is largest affordance family (597 MIDDLEs)

VIBRATION.description: Apparatus tremor from vigorous boiling or pressure buildup
VIBRATION.distillation_context: Physical vibration signals rate of reaction; sudden change = danger

architecture_mapping.relationship: RATE_MISMATCH (6%) = flow balance destroyed, vibration is symptom

CONDENSATE_WARMTH.description: Temperature of output condensate in the receiver
CONDENSATE_WARMTH.distillation_context: Warm condensate = condenser not cooling enough; cold = good separation

architecture_mapping.relationship: e (STABILITY_ANCHOR) represents cooling/equilibration
54.7% of recovery paths through e = cooling is primary recovery

GLASS_TENSION.description: Physical stress on glass vessel walls under thermal/pressure load
GLASS_TENSION.distillation_context: Experienced operator can feel vessel stress; crack risk under thermal shock

architecture_mapping.relationship: CONTAINMENT_TIMING (24%) includes vessel failure risk

ADJUSTMENT_DELAY.description: Lag between adjusting heat and seeing effect on distillation
ADJUSTMENT_DELAY.distillation_context: Thermal lag is real; operator must anticipate rather than react

architecture_mapping.relationship: Hazard gate: 1-token response, decay by offset+2 = minimal lag
No hidden accumulator; system responds to current state only

RETURN_TO_EQUILIBRIUM.description: Time for system to settle after a perturbation or adjustment
RETURN_TO_EQUILIBRIUM.distillation_context: After changing heat, system needs time to re-stabilize; faster = more controllable

architecture_mapping.relationship: e absorbs 54.7% of recovery paths; convergence to STATE-C (57.8% terminal)
Post-hazard QO recovery median 1.0 CHSH tokens = fast return

RATE_OF_CHANGE.description: How quickly system state is shifting (fast change = danger, slow = stable)
RATE_OF_CHANGE.distillation_context: Experienced operator monitors rate of change, not just absolute state

architecture_mapping.relationship: LINK operators (13.2% density) encode monitoring/observation phases
LINK mean position 0.476 (early-line) = monitoring before action

CYCLE_DURATION.description: Duration of one complete distillation cycle or fraction collection
CYCLE_DURATION.distillation_context: Each fraction takes a characteristic time; knowing when to expect completion

architecture_mapping.relationship: Folio = program = one distillation run/cycle
Line = control block = one operation within the cycle

INTER_FRACTION_GAP.description: Time between end of one fraction and start of next
INTER_FRACTION_GAP.distillation_context: Gap management: system must be re-prepared between fractions

architecture_mapping.relationship: Hard line resets (C670): each control block starts fresh
Cross-line MI = 0.52 bits (below null 0.72-0.77) = memory resets between blocks

explanation: Architecture->Sensory: 96.6% (28/29). Sensory->Architecture: 100.0% (25/25). Both directions exceed 60% threshold. The control architecture is compatible with sensory-driven pelican reflux operation.
